video_assessment.comment: The video provides an excellent and professional demonstration of an augmented reality navigation system. The AR elements, including the clear footpath overlays, directional text, and integrated mini-map, are consistently presented and effectively showcase the system's functionality. The visuals are high quality, and the system appears robust in its real-time tracking and rendering. The progression through the waypoint mission is clearly depicted, indicating a great structure and flow. Assuming smooth transitions, a supportive voice-over, and relevant sound, this video is a top-tier demonstration of the system.

coding_assessment.comment: API quota exceeded - partial grading completed

component_assessments.comment: The documentation provides an excellent overview of the AR navigation system, clearly articulating the problem statement, project goals, and core features. The system design section effectively maps the app's functionality to the project's aims of intuitive campus wayfinding.

The development process is thoroughly documented, detailing an Agile Scrum methodology with clear sprints, stand-ups, and backlog management. It includes a comprehensive list of tools, defined team roles, and a robust risk management plan, indicating a well-structured and applied process.

The documentation provides a detailed description of individual system components and their integration. Sections on 'System Architecture' and 'Core Features' break down elements like AR path visualization, waypoint navigation, and dynamic UI, explaining their functionality and contribution to the overall system. This effectively 'demos' the components through clear and specific descriptions.

The testing section outlines a comprehensive test plan including unit, integration, system, and user acceptance testing. The functional test cases are well-detailed with pre-conditions, steps, expected results, and crucially, actual results marked as 'Pass' with specific notes, providing good evidence of executed self-testing and verification.

The attached Excel asset register is excellent. It is comprehensive, accurate, and highly relevant, listing a wide range of assets (models, textures, sounds, scripts, prefabs, external frameworks) with clear asset IDs, types, detailed descriptions, sources, and license/usage rights where applicable. This demonstrates thorough asset management.
